editor.rich-text.title: Rich Text
editor.rich-text.description: A component which displays text written in Markdown language
editor.rich-text.text.title: Text
editor.rich-text.text.description: Text in markdown language to be displayed
editor.rich-text.textPosition.title: Text Position
editor.rich-text.textPosition.descriptio: Choose in which position of the component text will be displayed, left, center or right
editor.rich-text.textAlignment.title: Text Alignment
editor.rich-text.textAlignment.descripti: Control the text alignment inside component
editor.rich-text.font.title: Font token
editor.rich-text.font.description: Specify the font token to be used as default
editor.rich-text.textColor.title: Text Color token
editor.rich-text.textColor.description: Specify the text color token to be used
editor.rich-text.blockClass.title: Block class
editor.rich-text.blockClass.description: Unique class name to be appended to block classes
